title: Waiting for God's Best: 21-Day Devotional Journal for Single Women
description: Waiting for God’s Best is a book for single Christian women who desire marriage one day. This book serves as an instructional manual on establishing the right priorities for one’s life. It encourages single women to find and focus on their God-ordained purpose and to avoid rushing through the dating scene – in hopes of finding just someone to marry. Waiting for God’s Best contains practical wisdom to help single women avoid making costly mistakes and possibly choose the wrong mate.
author: Sherita D. Smith
